result.name: greater-cambridge-partnership-big-conversation-origin-destination-data
result.notes:
This dataset includes travel to work Origin/Destination data for Cambridge and the immediate surrounding areas. It is a subset of the data that was collected as part of the Greater Cambridge ‘Big Conversation’ Survey, Winter 2017.

This data release is only for all those travelling to work at a destination somewhere within postcode districts CB1 to CB5 (Cambridge).

Within the data resource itself, The From Column is the Postcode District that was the origin of the travel to work journeys.  The rows across show the breakdown of travel by mode.

Data is only shown where the sum of those travelling from a postcode district was more than 50 otherwise the counts were included under ‘other’ postcode district.

Cells with a count of less than five have been suppressed.

organization.name: cambridgeshire-insight
organization.title: Cambridgeshire Insight
organization.description: The Cambridgeshire Insight Partnership is made up of public, health and community bodies to provide a shared research knowledge base for the Cambridgeshire area. It allows users an easy way to access and share data, information and research for deeper insights about their local area. See more at https://cambridgeshireinsight.org.uk

result.title: Greater Cambridge Partnership Big Conversation: Origin/Destination Data

resources.description:
This data resource includes travel to work Origin/Destination data for Cambridge. It is a subset of the data was collected as part of the Greater Cambridge ‘Big Conversation’ Survey, Winter 2017.

This data release is only for all those travelling to work at a destination somewhere within postcode districts CB1 to CB5 (Cambridge).

Within the data resource itself, The From Column is the Postcode District that was the origin of the travel for work journey.  The rows across show the mode.

Data is only shown where the sum of those travelling from a postcode district was more than 50 otherwise the counts were included under ‘other’ postcode district.

Cells with a count of less than five have been suppressed.
resources.name: Big Conversation 2017- Origin Breakdown to CB1-CB5 (destination) Postcodes
